title: Offensive team name?
body:
Hi there! I've never posted here but I am a little upset but I don't know if this is a matter that I should submit to riot. 

As you all know, ranked recently reset. Me and my friend's played, won 4/5 and got bronze I (It's okay it was hilarious we all thought we would be silver)

Further looking through "Vi's Wardens" In Bronze V there was a team named **"Mike Brown Needed a GA"** . Is it bad for me to find this really offensive? It does not directly apply to me but there is a large group of people it would upset, and as they always say we wanna keep the rift a safe place, and it so safe when this stuff is flying around. I would like to have some way of maybe banning their name? But I don't know if that would cause more problems, because lately everything that goes on in that spectrum is mostly opinion... so it may not be an appropriate thing to report. 

I would love some help! Thank you! {{champion:51}}

replies.body:
Hey peceluvjillybear!

The best thing to do when encountering a name you think falls under the "offensive" category is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our specialists can take a look and see if this name is unacceptable.

Hope this helps!

I think it's funny how unregulated team names are, tbh.
I saw a team named "N^^^^^ D^^^" last season, but with the "I"s replaced with "1"s.
Tasteless joke, but still kiiinda funny.
